verse.name: c1
v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Parishuddulu harshimpa Yesu thwaragaa Rammani paluka maaru vaariki makutam Manassaaraga devuditchun mahima, ghanamu Mahimalo naanandimpa{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Shuddha jeevulaina deva sutulu prakaashimpan Sarvasrusti yokka mahaa karmamu lanniyu Theera raajuku mahima kalugu dinamulu Raagaa{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Daasulellaru koodi devuditchu makutamu Pondi veyi samvatsaramul raajyamelu chundu Nappudu, nemali, kokila, gorre, pulitho Vasinchun{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Chedala pudami nashimpa nava bhoomyaa kaashamul Kaluga shaapa paapamul sakala Kadu rogamu lellanu theera sukhamu Jayamutho nellaru naanandimpa{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v5
v6
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Spatika jeeva nadiyu iruprakkala jeeva Vrukshamunu aakali dappulu leka nata jeeva Phalamula bhujninchi, thinuchu thraaguchu Yesulo naanandimpa{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v7
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Parishuddhatmayu suthudu chesina rakshana Kaaryamunu thandri dootala ganamul nata Choochi praharshimpan krotha kaaryamu Koraku aanandimpa{/lang-eng}
